name: Road Builder Blitz
description:
Your construction skills are needed! Enjoy 10 construction mini-games as you attempt to quickly build bridges for the frantic, newly elected mayor. It’s going to be an all out blitz to build these bridges.

MINI-GAMES INCLUDED
-How will traffic flow without cones!?
-Excavate that dirt! Can you dig it?
-Hey you! Reinforce that rebar!
-Placing beams is my middle name...actually it’s Drew
-Hmmm, which of these hats is the safest?
-Computers, the constructioniest equipment
-Estimate the things
-Somebody has a screw loose
-Okay there are a lot of loose screws

ALSO
-See how your bridge looks at the end of each game. The better you do, the nicer your bridge turns out.
-The games get faster as you get further. HOW FAST CAN YOU PUT YOUR HAT ON?!
-Learn about the various construction trades and what goes into a highway construction project by exploring the icons on the final score screen.

Road Builder Blitz was developed in partnership with the Constructors Association of Western Pennsylvania (CAWP) and the Pennsylvania Department of Education to raise awareness of STEM-related construction careers amongst middle schoolers. Special thanks to 43rd District State Senator Jay Costa for his ongoing support. For more information about careers available in construction, visit www.futureroadbuilders.com.
